The correct answer is A: Click the plus icon in OBS, add a Window Capture, create it as “Live Split,” and select the LiveSplit window so viewers can see it on stream.
Explanation: The speaker instructs the listener to click the plus icon in OBS, add a new window capture, name it 'Live Split', and select that window as the source for the stream. This will allow viewers to see the timer in LiveSplit on the stream.
